text: @realDonaldTrump Failed President-coronavirus-worst economy ever-250000 people dying-all under your watch and I voted for you! Sleepy Joe gets my vote 2020. You're pathetic you take no blame for nothing that's why I'm changing my vote!!!!!!!!
